student.title: Student
student.description: A student user of the library.

id.description: The unique identifier for the student, same as their auth UID.

name.description: The full name of the student.

email.description: The email address of the student.

role.description: The role of the user, which is always 'student'.

avatar.description: A URL to the student's profile picture.

department.description: The academic department of the student.

course.description: The course the student is enrolled in.

yearOfStudy.description: The student's current year of study.

fines.description: The total amount of outstanding fines in INR.

/students/{studentId}.description: Stores the public profile information for each student user.
